query: The policy engine should block a tool that is on the deny list for the current agent
expected_behavior: A tool on the agent's deny list is rejected before execution, without calling the handler
The policy engine returns a structured error result (not an exception/crash) to the agent loop
The deny rule wins over any allow rule when both match the same tool
A tool in a denied group (e.g. 'net') is also blocked even if not listed by name
An allowed tool not on the deny list executes normally without interference from the policy engine
